page.title: 18WESTON PARK, HERTS.
page.content: {Weston Park}is owned by the {Pryor family who have lived there since{xxxx but most of the Park is now rented to tenants including the flats, fields and stable cottages.{The house}is made up of several homes. There are{flats in the main house, a gate{lodge, gardeners{cottage}and stable cottages. The house is surrounded by grass land grazed on by sheep and dairy cattle and woods with lakes which people fish in. Much of the Park is used for breeding and shooting{pheasants.}There is quite big garden which Mrs.A.Pryor, Tom Clements and Miss. Millen-Holme garden. Tom Clements lives at the gardeners cottage and does odd jobs about the Park. There are quite a few {game keepers,}usually five in number. There is a scout camp and cricket pitch for the Weston cricket club within the grounds.
